The Mona Lisa, painted by Leonardo da Vinci in the early 16th century, is arguably the most famous painting in the world. Despite its fame, the artwork measures just 77 cm × 53 cm, much smaller than many people expect .

The Mona Lisa was painted by Leonardo da Vinci in the early 16th century. It measures just 77 cm × 53 cm, which is smaller than many people expect. This information is from the official website of the Louvre Museum, where the painting is housed. The URL for the source is https://www.louvre.fr/en/oeuvre-notices/mona-lisa-portrait-lisa-gherardini-wife-francesco-del-giocondo.
